name: Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises, Inc.
description: Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises, Inc. (BW) is a global leader in energy and environmental technologies and services. Founded in 1867, the company has a long history of providing innovative solutions to enhance the efficiency and sustainability of energy production. BW specializes in the design and manufacture of advanced technologies for utility and industrial applications, including renewable energy, waste-to-energy, and emissions control systems. Their offerings include boiler systems, air pollution control solutions, and energy storage technologies, aiming to help clients reduce their carbon footprint and improve operational efficiency. BW's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its focus on developing technologies that support the transition to cleaner energy sources. The company serves a diverse range of industries, including power generation, oil and gas, and manufacturing, and is recognized for its engineering expertise and reliable service. With a strategic vision to drive innovation and operational excellence, BW is dedicated to shaping the future of energy through advanced technologies and sustainable practices.
